name: Simpletalk
body:
SimpleTalk
========
A simple chat application that can be easily integrated into bigger systems.
This application uses:
- Jquery (latest release available)
- javascript-linkify from [Cowboy](https:github.com/cowboy)
- Smileys from Wikimedia commons [Wikimedia](http://commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/Smiley)

Features
--------
- Simple for users to join and talk.
- Cross-plattform
- Easy on server resources
- Stable
- Easy accessible logs
